    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String imagePath)
        Constructor of the player which takes a path as String to load the player image. Also adds the InputListeners and initializes the UI elements.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - String path to a image/texture to use for drawing the player on screen.
